achievement.name: Points in Your Favor

achievement.name: Ballistic
achievement.description: Kill 5 enemy players within 15 seconds

achievement.name: Ammo Conservation
achievement.description: Kill two enemy players with a single bullet

achievement.name: War Bonds

achievement.name: Variety Hour

achievement.name: Primer
achievement.description: Do at least 95% damage to an enemy who is then killed by a another player

achievement.name: Finishing Schooled

achievement.name: Shot With Their Pants Down

achievement.name: Safety First

achievement.name: Hip Shot

achievement.name: Eye to Eye

achievement.name: Dead Man Stalking

achievement.name: Death From Above
achievement.description: Kill an enemy player while you are airborne

achievement.name: Aerial Necrobatics
achievement.description: Kill an airborne enemy while you are also airborne

achievement.name: Black Bag Operation
achievement.description: Win a round while making no footstep noise and killing at least one enemy

achievement.name: Cold War
achievement.description: Win a round without your team killing any enemy players

achievement.name: Killanthropist
achievement.description: Donate 100 weapons to your teammates

achievement.name: The Frugal Beret
achievement.description: Win 10 rounds without dying and not spending any cash

achievement.name: Defusus Interruptus
achievement.description: Stop defusing to kill a terrorist and then successfully finish defusing the bomb

achievement.name: Participation Award
achievement.description: Kill an enemy player within 3 seconds of them recovering a dropped bomb

achievement.name: Decimator
achievement.description: Dominate a total of 10 enemy players

achievement.name: Overkill
achievement.description: Kill an opponent you are already dominating

achievement.name: Command and Control
achievement.description: Get a total of 100 kills on enemy players you are dominating

achievement.name: Can't Keep a Good Man Down
achievement.description: Kill a total of 20 enemy players that are dominating you

achievement.name: Dressed to Kill
achievement.description: Start a round with all players on your team wearing the same uniform (at least 5 players)

achievement.name: Hat Trick
achievement.description: Dominate three enemy players simultaneously

achievement.name: Ten Angry Men
achievement.description: Get 10 kills on enemy players you are already dominating during a single match

achievement.name: Excessive Brutality
achievement.description: Kill an enemy player 4 additional times while you are dominating them

achievement.name: Spray and Pray
achievement.description: Kill two enemy players while you are blinded from a flashbang

achievement.name: Friendly Attire
achievement.description: Start a round on the same team as 4 of your friends, with all of you wearing the same outfit

achievement.name: The Road to Hell
achievement.description: Blind an enemy player who then kills a teammate

achievement.name: Avenging Angel
achievement.description: Kill an enemy player in the same round as they kill a player on your friends list

achievement.name: Clan Warfare
achievement.description: Win a match of at least 10 players where the entirety of each team is composed of a single clan
